backend/main.mo: Main actor defining game, item, and catalog types with query methods for fetching games, items, search results, categories, and update status.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new structure by adding an empty catalogGames map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a frontend game-discovery feature to impacted files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root defining router setup with routes for search, game details, and item details wrapped in layout components.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component showing an empty-state message with optional icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying attribution text and link using a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app branding, navigation link, and a home button using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching the backend actor, handling identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and related context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching games, items, and update status from an actor API with structured query keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme CSS variables, including light/dark color palettes and a subtle paper texture.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailPage.tsx: Renders detailed game info with filtering, category tabs, and item lists using data from catalog and crafting queries.
frontend/src/pages/GameSearchPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of catalog games with a hero banner, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed item information including category, required materials, and navigation back to the game page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations reflecting the app’s theme.
project_state.json: Defines overall project metadata, goals, architectural notes, and a list of existing implemented or planned features for a crafting‑database game app. Tracks schema version, project state version, and descriptive information used for build planning.
